metadata.description: Asking teacher questions politely for first-class

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 你好! 我是小美。让我们学习如何礼貌地问老师问题。

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: Say: 'Could you explain that again, please?'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: Could you explain that again, please?

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 太棒了! That's very polite and clear!

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: You can also say: 'Excuse me, teacher, may I ask a question?'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: Excuse me, teacher, may I ask a question?

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 好棒! Asking questions helps you learn!
